member.name: T:BooseApp.BooseCanvas
member.summary: Represents a drawable canvas that allows for basic drawing operations such as lines, circles, and rectangles.
member.remarks: The class provides methods to draw shapes and lines on a bitmap canvas. It maintains a current pen position and color, which can be adjusted using the provided methods.

member.name: M:BooseApp.BooseCanvas.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Boose construtor

member.name: P:BooseApp.BooseCanvas.Xpos
member.summary: Gets or sets the X-coordinate position.

member.name: P:BooseApp.BooseCanvas.Ypos
member.summary: Gets or sets the Y-coordinate position.

member.name: P:BooseApp.BooseCanvas.PenColour
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the pen used for drawing.

member.name: M:BooseApp.BooseCanvas.Circle(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: method to draw a circle on the canvas

member.name: M:BooseApp.BooseCanvas.Clear
member.summary: method to clear the canvas

member.name: M:BooseApp.BooseCanvas.DrawTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: method to draw a line from the current position to the specified position

member.name: M:BooseApp.BooseCanvas.getBitmap
member.summary: Retrieves the current bitmap from the canvas.
member.returns: An object representing the current bitmap on the canvas.

member.name: M:BooseApp.BooseCanvas.MoveTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the pen object to the specified coordinates.
member.param: The new x-coordinate of the pen.
The new y-coordinate of the pen

member.summary: method to draw a rectangle on the canvas

member.name: T:BooseApp.Form1
member.summary: Represents the main form of the BOOSE IDE application.
member.remarks: This form provides a user interface for entering commands, displaying error reports, and rendering graphical output. It includes components such as a command input field, an error display textbox, and a drawing board area.

member.name: M:BooseApp.Form1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: This constructor sets up the form by initializing its components and setting up the necessary objects for the application, including a drawing canvas, a command factory, a stored program, and a parser. It also outputs version information to the debug console.

member.name: F:BooseApp.Form1.components
member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.name: M:BooseApp.Form1.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.
